WorkPlace.Name: AMC - CONSULT A/S
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
AMC-Consult A/S beskæftiger sig med udvikling-, vedligehold- og konsulent-arbejde indenfor økonomi- og bankforretnings-software. 
AMC-Consult A/S er en mindre virksomhed som beskæftiger idag 20 personer.

HiringOrg.Name: AMC - CONSULT A/S
HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription:
AMC-Consult A/S beskæftiger sig med udvikling-, vedligehold- og konsulent-arbejde indenfor økonomi- og bankforretnings-software. 
AMC-Consult A/S er en mindre virksomhed som beskæftiger idag 20 personer.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Back-end software developer

We are looking for a software developer, that can develop our software product.

 

Your daily tasks will mainly be about developing and bettering our payment module in cooperation with your team, and under supervision of your manager.

Your primary tasks would be

  • Maintenance, development and documentation of AMC’s software.
  • Attending testing phase when implementing new functionalities.
  • Completing technical ad hoc tasks.

Aspects in your CV that we appreciate

  • Relevant educational background.
  • Experience within developing.
  • Experience with Java.
  • Danish is not a requirement, but a plus.

Professional traits and abilities we’re hoping to find in you

  • Business understanding
  • Independent and self-driven approach
  • The ability to put complicated stuff simply
  • The desire to create quality

About AMC

AMC is among the world’s leading ERP bank integration ISV, and is a Microsoft Silver Certified partner.

The main office, where the job position resides, is located at Frederiksberg, Copenhagen. This department houses around 20 employees of both Danish and international background.
AMC has existed in 30 years, and many of its customers are among the largest corporations in Denmark. The salary will depend on your profile.

Read more about our business at: https://www.amcbanking.com/.
